congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate began consideration of H.R. 1, to provide for reconciliation D1256pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018, after agreeing to the motion to proceed, and taking action on the following motion and amendment proposed thereto:<P/>McConnell (for Hatch/Murkowski) Amendment No. 1618, of a perfecting nature.<P/>During consideration of this measure today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 52 yeas to 48 nays (Vote No. 284), Senate agreed to the motion to proceed to consideration of the bill.
